metadata.Title: CVE-2015-4504 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
The lut_inverse_interp16 function in the QCMS library in Mozilla Firefoxbefore 41.0 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information orcause a denial of service (buffer over-read and application crash) viacrafted attributes in the ICC 4 profile of an image.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-4504` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 41.0+build3-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
firefox-globalmenu - 41.0+build3-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 41.0+build3-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
firefox-testsuite - 41.0+build3-0ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '41.0+build3-0ubuntu0.14.04.1').
